metadata.name: Cheer No More
metadata.description:
Piece: Cheer No More  
Edition: 1/1  
By: Stacey Sparkles (@the_sparkler)  
Country: USA  
Year Visited: 2020  
Schoolâ€™s Current Status: Abandoned

Four hours from home, in the outskirts of a dilapidated city, sits an abandoned school, with the glass of every single window missing. From the outside, one passing by might think it's just a shell of a building. But just beyond the gaping holes, lays a beautiful auditorium, crumbling little by little. And if you are brave enough to hop inside - and if you listen really carefully - you might hear the sounds of swishing pom poms and cheers for the home team, at the pep rally before a big game. Or...you might hear nothing but dripping water, plaster falling from the ceiling, and cars passing by. What do you hear?
